alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jackson, Bay, northwestern Calhoun, Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 203 PM EDT/103 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms across the western FL Panhandle, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Malone, Freeport, Cottondale, Greenwood, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Alford and Caryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
